mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lms_calendar_table( event_id, member_id, event_title, event_start, event_end, event_type, event_description, event_backgroundColor ) VALUES( lms_calendar_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{event_title}, #{event_start}, #{event_end}, #{event_type}, #{event_description}, #{event_backgroundColor} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lms_calendar_table ORDER BY event_id
mapper.update: UPDATE lms_calendar_table SET event_title=#{event_title}, event_start=#{event_start}, event_end=#{event_end}, event_type=#{event_type}, event_description=#{event_description}, event_backgroundColor=#{event_backgroundColor} WHERE event_id = #{event_id}
